p: Graphs were prepared using the software Graphpad PRISM V7.0. Statistical analyses were performed using IBM SPSS V21.0. For the correlation analysis, all data were transformed to the logarithm of 10 in order to better fit a Gaussian distribution. Both Pearson's and partial correlations were performed. To test the effect of transfection with defective genomes the ratio of virus released between control and test was found and subjected to 1 sample T-test.
